The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all over the place and several shriveled, beady eyed mummies hanging from convex shapes under the spikes. Later on, a huge preacher like fella withered away seems to be praying to a throne like device up top with a glowing eye.

I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie in the theater. I usually prefer to watch after we have it taped and watch it in the comfort of your chair -- with interruptions for bathroom trips and bathroom visits.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three in the series.
A group has just targeted an army base, and have stolen one and a half truckloads of military weapons, and kidnapped three soldiers including Kathie Peck, the girlfriend of Sargent Joe Armstrong (Joe) (Dudikoff).
